scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 1
scripts.build: rm -rf ./bin/main && cd src && go build ./src/main.go && cp ./main ../bin/main
scripts.build-win: rm -rf ./bin/main.exe && cd src && env GOOS=windows GOARCH=386 go build -o main.exe ./src/main.go && cp ./main.exe ../bin/main.exe
